title: Kcorena的上下左右
content:

  display: none;

}

.image {max-height: 600px;}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/瓜瓜精灵 width="300px" height="300px"]]

[[=]]
+++++* 点击一些图片以于新页面中查看大图
[[size 200%]]**Kcorena的上下左右**[[/size]]
++++++* 又称Kcorena的非LOGO艺作页
[[/=]]
------
++ **矢量画图**
------
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-1559 青鸟 | hide=○ SCP-CN-1559 青鸟]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork/cn-1559%20青鸟.svg]]

2020年5月精品：[[[SCP-CN-1559]]]。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-791 音乐狐| hide=○ SCP-CN-791 音乐狐]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork/CN-791%20音乐狐.svg]]

[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 暴云荒野系列| hide=○ 暴云荒野系列]]

具体在我人事页中有整理。暴云荒野系列 by [[*user Aplous]]。

------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2001 大雾降临| hide=○ SCP-CN-2001 大雾降临]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork/2001大雾降临 link="*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork/2001大雾降临"]]

2k竞赛第五名，大雾降临by [[*user Diamond_Apple]]。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2999 Observator Ex Machina| hide=○ SCP-CN-2999 Observator Ex Machina]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork/2999OEM link="*https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork/2999OEM"]]

不一定是2k竞赛第二名，[[[SCP-CN-2999|Observator Ex Machina]]] by道哥。

------

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/禹王不死 link="*https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/禹王不死"]]

[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
------
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 夏日烈阳| hide=○ 夏日烈阳]]

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/夏日烈阳 link="*https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/夏日烈阳"]]

或者叫做「与你度过的那个夏日」。76年班相关印象图。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2758 艾格洛斯之枪| hide=○ SCP-CN-2758 艾格洛斯之枪]]

[[[SCP-CN-2758]]] - 艾格洛斯之枪
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2599 此在| hide=○ SCP-CN-2599 此在]]

[[=image https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/此在%202.0 link="*https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/此在%202.0"]]

[[[SCP-CN-2599]]] - 此在
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 观谬图片已失效| hide=○ 观谬图片已失效]]

[[=image https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/观谬 link="*https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/观谬"]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 终无信仰| hide=○ 终无信仰]]

[[=image https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/信仰终结 link="*https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/信仰终结"]]

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/belief 终无信仰中心页]

基础图案由我制作，[[*user Liu dao]]在我的方案基础上修改了图案排布并确认了现在的款式。感谢。

[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 2022夏季征文| hide=○ 2022夏季征文]]

[[=image https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/夏季征文 link="*https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/夏季征文"]]

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/summer-contest-2022 2022夏季征文中心页]

看到一个效果感觉挺适合这个主题的，就随手搞了个。感觉还可以。

[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------

++ **像素画**
------
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2980 你的硫酸铜朋友| hide=○ SCP-CN-2980 你的硫酸铜朋友]]

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/%E7%A1%AB%E9%85%B8%E9%93%9C%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B]]

2021年7月精品SCP：[[[SCP-CN-2980]]] - 你的硫酸铜朋友 by Ikaite。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2270 彩虹山| hide=○ SCP-CN-2270 彩虹山]]

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/彩虹山]]

2021年8月精品SCP：[[[SCP-CN-2270]]] - 彩虹山 by The Obsidian Shard。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 今日，神之血洒落天穹| hide=○ 今日，神之血洒落天穹]]

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/神之血]]

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/today-the-blood-of-god-is-burning-in-the-skies 今日，神之血洒落天穹] by 句号。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2282 许愿树下| hide=○ SCP-CN-2282 许愿树下]]

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/许愿树]]

[[[SCP-CN-2282]]] 许愿树下 by 夜莺。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
------
[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ 瓜瓜精灵| hide=○ 瓜瓜精灵]]

因为好像和基金会没啥关系，但毕竟是我第一个试手用的像素画gif，就用来当版头了。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------

++ **其他**
------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆ SCP-CN-2470 解脱| hide=○SCP-CN-2470 解脱]]

[[=image https://darry.wikidot.com/local--files/upload/痛苦守恒]]

[[[SCP-CN-2470]]] 解脱 by R 和 心象。
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

------

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=∆《收容大师》 游戏宣传图| hide=○《收容大师》 游戏宣传图]]

[[=image https://uploadfile.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork-2/收容大师]]

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/srds 收容大师]中出现的游戏。有时间的话还想弄个带这个的VR主页看看。

背景图为[https://pixabay.com/zh/photos/hallway-monotonous-black-and-white-2886363/ 这个]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]
